data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stade du Pays de Charleroi have now been confirmed.
Oostende kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
In the minute 33, Oostende make their first substitution with Cameron McGeehan replacing Andrew Hjulsager.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Charleroi kick-off.
In the minute 50, Oostende's Jelle Bataille has been booked in Charleroi.
Makhtar Gueye (Oostende) has received a yellow card from Wesli De Cremer.
Marko Kvasina is on a sub for Makhtar Gueye for Oostende.
In the minute 63, Kaveh Rezaei is replacing Marco Ilaimaharitra for the home team.
The away team replace Ari Skulason with Theo Ndicka.
Charleroi take a 1-0 lead thanks to Kaveh Rezaei.
In the minute 80, Ryota Morioka (Charleroi) gets a yellow card.
Karim Belhocine (Charleroi) is making a second substitution, with Lucas Ribeiro replacing Ali Gholizadeh.
David Henen is on a sub for Mamadou Fall for Charleroi.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
